item.title: XRayInterceptor
item.description: TODO: Document the XRayInterceptor ðŸŽ‰ Sparta v1.7.0: The Time Machine Edition ðŸ•° ðŸŽ‰ For those times when you wish you could go back in time and enable debug logging for a single request.https://t.co/BP60qQpKva#serverless #go — Matt Weagle (@mweagle) November 12, 2018 Sparta v1.7.0 adds `Interceptors`: user defined hooks called during the lambda event handling flow to support cross-cutting concerns. The first interceptor is an XRay annotation and metadata interceptor.
